statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Marcus Romain scored 19 of his 28 points in the second half, grabbed 10 rebounds and Mississippi Valley State snapped a 15-game losing streak with a 73-70 win over Alabama State on Monday night.
article.headline: MVSU snaps 15-game skid with 73-70 win over Alabama State
article.linkText: MVSU snaps 15-game skid with 73-70 win over Alabama State
article.story: ITTA BENA, Miss. -- Marcus Romain scored 19 of his 28 points in the second half, grabbed 10 rebounds and Mississippi Valley State snapped a 15-game losing streak with a 73-70 win over Alabama State on Monday night. Trailing by two at the break, Mississippi Valley State (1-15, 1-2 Southwestern Athletic Conference) shot 64 percent in the second half and led by as much as 12 before the Hornets clawed back in the final minutes. Alabama State used a 10-1 run capped by Reginald Gee's jumper to cut the deficit to 69-66 with 1:39 left but MVSU protected the margin down the stretch. Last year, the Delta Devils lost 14 straight before getting their first win. Romain hit 11 of his 16 shots from the field and Kylan Phillips added 12 points with six rebounds for the Delta Devils. Gee had 28 points for Alabama State (3-13, 1-3), which lost its third straight. Demetruis Houston added 12 points and 11 rebounds, Tony Armstrong got 11 points and Amir Warnock 10.
